Review: The food here is always delicious and the service is top-notch. The crispy roasted chicken is a must-try! Highly recommend.
The sushi here is fresh, but the presentation could use some work. The selection is decent but the prices are a bit steep. Overall, okay for a sushi fix.
The pasta dishes are okay, but the ambiance leaves much to be desired. The service is slow and the noise level is high. I wouldn't rush to come back.
The flavors were overpowering and left a bad taste in my mouth. The chicken tikka masala was dry and lacked any real depth of flavor. Not worth the visit.
The escargots were decent but the croque-monsieur was soggy and lacked flavor. The atmosphere was stuffy and the prices were steep for the quality of the food. Not worth a repeat visit.
The Pad Thai was flavorful and the portion sizes were generous. The service was fast and friendly, and the prices were reasonable. Would recommend.
The steaks were cooked to perfection and the sides were delicious. The atmosphere was lively and the service was attentive. A great spot for a special occasion.
The chips and salsa were fresh and the margaritas were well-made. The entrees were hit or miss, but overall a decent spot for Mexican food.
The noodles were overcooked and the broth was bland. The service was slow and the atmosphere was uninviting. Not worth a second visit.
The gyros were delicious and the tzatziki was tangy. The portions were generous and the prices were reasonable. Would recommend for a quick, satisfying lunch.
The seafood was fresh and flavorful, but the prices were a bit steep for the portion sizes. The atmosphere was charming and the service was attentive. Overall, okay for a seafood fix.
The soup was hearty and the sandwiches were piled high. The atmosphere was casual and the prices were reasonable. A good option for a quick, comfort-food meal.
The vegetarian options were flavorful and well-presented. The atmosphere was cozy and the service was friendly. A great spot for a healthy meal.
The barbecue ribs were fall-off-the-bone tender and the sauce was delicious. The atmosphere was lively and the prices were reasonable. Would recommend for a hearty meal.
The pizza was undercooked and the toppings were sparse. The service was slow and the atmosphere was uninviting. Not worth a second visit.
The burgers were juicy and the fries were crispy. The beer selection was decent and the atmosphere was casual. A good spot for a quick, casual meal.
The dumplings were overcooked and the stir-fry was lacking in flavor. The service was slow and the atmosphere was uninviting. Not worth a second visit.
The burgers are always hot and juicy, and the prices are unbeatable. A must for fast food lovers!
The tacos are decent, but the salsa could use more flavor. The prices are reasonable and the service is quick.
